Divonis Bebas, Sofyan Basir Segera Keluar dari Rumah Tahanan KPK
04 Nov 2019, 17:09 by Eko Sulestyono



Divonis Bebas, Sofyan Basir Segera Keluar dari Rumah Tahanan KPK



Divonis Bebas, Sofyan Basir Segera Keluar dari Rumah Tahanan KPK


KBRN, Jakarta : Mantan Direktur Utama (Dirut) PT. PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir divonis bebas oleh Ketua Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Tindak Pidana (Tipikor) dalam kasus dugaan korupsi suap  proyek pembangunan Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uap (PLTU) Riau-1.
Kabiro Humas KPK Febri Diansyah kepada wartawan mengatakan bahwa KPK menunggu petikan putusan dari Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta. Menurut Febri, sebelum mengeluarkan Sofyan dari rutan, pihaknya akan meminta bukti petikan putusan dan akan dibuatkan berita acaranya.
"Tergantung petikan putusannya, biasanya petikan putusan langsung diserahkan hari ini," kata Febri Diansyah di Gedung KPK Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Febri mengatakan,sebekumnya  KPK pernah melepaskan terdakwa Syafruddin Arsyad Temenggung dalam kasus dugaan korupsi terkait skandal Bantuan Likuiditas Bank Indonesia. Saat itu, KPK baru melepas Syafruddin setlah petikan putusannya  diterima.
Sementara itu terdakwa Sofyan Basir sebelumnya dinyatakan tidak bersalah melanggar Pasal 12 huruf a junctoPasal 15 Undang-Undang (UU) Pemberantasan Tipikor junctoPasal 56 Ke-2 KUHP dan Pasal 11 junctoPasal 15 UU Pemberantasan Tipikor juncto pasal 56 Ke-2 KUHP.
Menurut Ketua Majelis Hakim, terdakwa Sofyan tidak terbukti memfasilitasi pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada mantan anggota DPR Eni Maulani Saragih dan mantan Mensos Idrus Marham.
Hakim yang mengadili juga meminta agar Sofyan segera dikeluarkan dari rumah tahanan. Untuk diketahui, Sofyan saat ini ditahan di rutan yang berada di belakang gedung merah putih KPK.
"Memerintahkan kepada jaksa untuk mengeluarkan terdakwa (Sofyan Basir) dari tahanan," kata hakim ketua Hariono saat membacakan amar putusan dalam sidang di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).
Sementara itu, Susilo Arwibowo kuasa hukum sekaligus pengacara Sofyan Basir kepada wartawan di Jakarta memastikan bahwa petikan putusan telah diterima KPK. Selanjutnya akan dibuatkan berita acaranya, tak lama kemudian Sofyan Basir akan segera dibebaskan dari runah tahanan KPK.

Sentenced Free, Sofyan Basir Immediately Exit the KPK Detention Center
Nov 04 2019, 17:09 by Eko Sulestyono



Sentenced Free, Sofyan Basir Immediately Exit the KPK Detention Center



Sentenced Free, Sofyan Basir Immediately Exit the KPK Detention Center


KBRN, Jakarta: Former President Director (Managing Director) of PT. PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir was acquitted by the Chief Judge of the Criminal Court (Corruption Court) in a case of alleged bribery corruption in the Riau-1 Steam Power Plant construction project.
KPK Head of Public Relations, Febri Diansyah, told reporters that the KPK was waiting for an excerpt from the Jakarta Corruption Court. According to Febri, before removing Sofyan from the detention center, his party would ask for proof of the verdict and the news would be made.
"Depending on the excerpt of the decision, usually the excerpt is immediately handed over today," said Febri Diansyah at the KPK Building in Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
Febri said that before the KPK had acquitted the defendant Syafruddin Arsyad Temenggung in a corruption case related to the Bank Indonesia Liquidity Assistance scandal. At that time, the KPK only released Syafruddin after the verdict was received.
Meanwhile the defendant Sofyan Basir was previously found not guilty of violating Article 12 letter a juncto Article 15 of the Law on the Elimination of Corruption Anti-Corruption Article 56 Second KUHP and Article 11 juncto Article 15 of the Law on Eradication of Corruption in conjunction with Article 56 of the 2nd KUHP.
According to the Chairman of the Panel of Judges, Defendant Sofyan was not proven to facilitate the giving of bribes from businessman Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo to former DPR member Eni Maulani Saragih and former Social Minister Idrus Marham.
The judge presiding also requested that Sofyan be immediately removed from the detention center. To note, Sofyan is currently detained in a detention center behind the KPK's red and white building.
"Ordered the prosecutor to remove the defendant (Sofyan Basir) from detention," said chief judge Hariono while reading the verdict in a trial at the Jakarta Corruption Court, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Central Jakarta, Monday (4/11/2019).
Meanwhile, Susilo Arwibowo's attorney and lawyer Sofyan Basir told reporters in Jakarta that the KPK had received a verdict. Then the news will be made, and soon Sofyan Basir will be released from the custody of the KPK prisoners.
